description:
The Expression properties element set consists of properties representing attributes and relationships of the RDA *Timespan* entity.

Version: 1.0.0

P70001.label: has related work of timespan
P70001.description: Relates a timespan to a work that is associated with a timespan.

P70002.label: has related expression of timespan
P70002.description: Relates a timespan to an expression that is associated with a timespan.

P70003.label: has related manifestation of timespan
P70003.description: Relates a timespan to a manifestation that is associated with a timespan.

P70004.label: has related item of timespan
P70004.description: Relates a timespan to an item that is associated with a timespan.

P70005.label: has related agent of timespan
P70005.description: Relates a timespan to an agent who is associated with a timespan.

P70006.label: has related collective agent of timespan
P70006.description: Relates a timespan to a collective agent who is associated with a timespan.

P70007.label: has related place of timespan
P70007.description: Relates a timespan to a place that is associated with a timespan.

P70008.label: has related timespan of timespan
P70008.description: Relates a timespan to a timespan that is associated with a timespan.

P70009.label: has related nomen of timespan
P70009.description: Relates a timespan to a nomen that is associated with a timespan.

P70010.label: has related RDA entity of timespan
P70010.description: Relates a timespan to an RDA entity that is associated with a timespan.

P70011.label: has related person of timespan
P70011.description: Relates a timespan to a person who is associated with a timespan.

P70012.label: has related family of timespan
P70012.description: Relates a timespan to a family who is associated with a timespan.

P70013.label: has related corporate body of timespan
P70013.description: Relates a timespan to a corporate body who is associated with a timespan.

P70014.label: is subject timespan of
P70014.description: Relates a timespan to a work that is about a timespan.

P70015.label: has access point for timespan
P70015.description: Relates a timespan to an appellation of timespan in natural language that is taken from a vocabulary encoding scheme or is constructed using a string encoding scheme.

P70016.label: has appellation of timespan
P70016.description: Relates a timespan to a nomen used within a given scheme or context to refer to a timespan.

P70017.label: has name of timespan
P70017.description: Relates a timespan to an appellation of timespan in natural language and phrasing used in common discourse.

P70018.label: has identifier for timespan
P70018.description: Relates a timespan to an appellation of timespan that consists of a code, number, or other string, usually independent of natural language and social naming conventions, used to identify a timespan.

P70019.label: is copyright date of
P70019.description: Relates a timespan to a manifestation that is associated with a claim of protection under copyright or a similar regime during a timespan.

P70020.label: is date of manifestation of
P70020.description: Relates a timespan to a manifestation that is published, released, issued, printed, duplicated, cast, distributed, etc., in a published form or is inscribed, fabricated, constructed, etc., in a unpublished form during a timespan.

P70021.label: is epoch of
P70021.description: Relates a timespan to a work that refers to measurements of position for a body or orientation for an orbit.

P70022.label: is date of work of
P70022.description: Relates a timespan to a work that is associated with the earliest timespan.

P70023.label: is date of capture of
P70023.description: Relates a timespan to an expression that is recorded, filmed, etc., during a timespan.

P70024.label: is date of expression of
P70024.description: Relates a timespan to an expression that is associated with the earliest timespan.

P70025.label: is date of distribution of
P70025.description: Relates a timespan to a manifestation that is a published manifestation that is distributed during a timespan.

P70026.label: is date of manufacture of
P70026.description: Relates a timespan to a manifestation that is a published manifestation that is printed, duplicated, cast, etc., during a timespan.

P70027.label: is date of production of
P70027.description: Relates a timespan to a manifestation that is an unpublished manifestation that is inscribed, fabricated, constructed, etc., during a timespan.

P70028.label: is date of publication of
P70028.description: Relates a timespan to a manifestation that is published, released, or issued in a published form during a timespan.

P70029.label: is date of birth of
P70029.description: Relates a timespan to a person who was born during a timespan.

P70030.label: is date of death of
P70030.description: Relates a timespan to a person who died during a timespan.

P70031.label: is date of conference of
P70031.description: Relates a timespan to a conference, exhibition, or other formally named and convened event that gives rise to a work and that is held during a timespan.

P70032.label: is date of establishment of
P70032.description: Relates a timespan to a corporate body who is established or founded during a timespan.

P70033.label: is date of termination of
P70033.description: Relates a timespan to a corporate body who is terminated or dissolved during a timespan.

P70034.label: is part of timespan
P70034.description: Relates a timespan to a timespan that has another timespan as a discrete component.

P70035.label: has part timespan
P70035.description: Relates a timespan to a timespan that is a discrete component of another timespan.

P70036.label: is date associated with corporate body of (Deprecated)

P70037.label: is date associated with family of (Deprecated)

P70038.label: is date associated with person of (Deprecated)
P70038.description: Relates a timespan to a person who has a significant association with a timespan. (Deprecated)

P70039.label: has beginning
P70039.description: Relates a timespan to the time at which the timespan starts.

P70040.label: has ending
P70040.description: Relates a timespan to the time at which the timespan ends.

P70041.label: is duration of
P70041.description: Relates a timespan to an expression that has an extent of expression that is a playing time, performance time, running time, or other timespan.

P70042.label: is equinox of
P70042.description: Relates a timespan to a work that uses a point of intersection of the ecliptic and the celestial equator, occupied by the sun when its declination is 0°.

P70043.label: is period of activity of corporate body of
P70043.description: Relates a timespan to a corporate body who is active in its primary field of endeavour during a timespan.

P70044.label: is period of activity of person of
P70044.description: Relates a timespan to a person who is active in their primary field of endeavour during a timespan.

P70045.label: has note on timespan
P70045.description: Relates a timespan to a broad unstructured description of one or more attributes of a timespan.

P70046.label: is year degree granted of
P70046.description: Relates a timespan to a work that is a thesis associated with an academic degree that is conferred by a granting institution or faculty during a timespan.

P70047.label: has authorized access point for timespan
P70047.description: Relates a timespan to an access point for timespan that is selected for preference in a specific vocabulary encoding scheme.

P70048.label: has variant access point for timespan
P70048.description: Relates a timespan to an access point for timespan that is not selected for preference in a specific vocabulary encoding scheme.

P70049.label: has preferred name of timespan
P70049.description: Relates a timespan to a name of timespan that is selected for preference in a specific application or context.

P70050.label: has variant name of timespan
P70050.description: Relates a timespan to a name of timespan that is not selected for preference in a specific application or context.

P70051.label: is period of activity of agent of
P70051.description: Relates a timespan to an agent who is active in its primary field of endeavour during a timespan.

P70052.label: is period of activity of collective agent of
P70052.description: Relates a timespan to a collective agent who is active in its primary field of endeavour during a timespan.

P70053.label: is period of activity of family of
P70053.description: Relates a timespan to a family who is active in its primary field of endeavour during a timespan.

P70054.label: is date of capture of representative expression of
P70054.description: Relates a timespan to a work associated with a representative expression that is recorded, filmed, etc., during a timespan.

P70055.label: is duration of representative expression of
P70055.description: Relates a timespan to a work that has an extent of expression of a representative expression that is a playing time, performance time, running time, or other timespan.

P70056.label: is date of usage of
P70056.description: Relates a timespan to an appellation of an RDA entity that is used during a timespan.

P70057.label: is date of representative expression of
P70057.description: Relates a timespan to a work that is associated with the earliest timespan of a representative expression.

P70058.label: has related entity of timespan
P70058.description: Relates a timespan to an entity that is associated with a timespan.

P70059.label: has category of timespan
P70059.description: Relates a timespan to a type to which a timespan belongs.

P70060.label: is timespan described in
P70060.description: Relates a timespan to a work that describes a timespan.
